DOC.brief_summary: The proposed study is designed to utilize a self-hypnosis training program for patients awaiting lung transplantation. This technique can increase their well being, particularly by decreasing postoperative pain.
DOC.brief_title: Self-hypnosis in Patients Awaiting Lung Transplantation
DOC.criteria: patients aged 15 years or more requiring lung transplantation patients who cannot participate in learning sessions of selfhypnosis for cultural , cognitive or environmental reasons patients who have participated in only one learning selfhypnosis session before transplantation
